languages.text: {n}Стоявшая в стороне девушка делает шаг к вам и шепчет.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, умоляю, послушайте! Этот человек происходит из дворянской семьи! Его пытаются оклеветать!"

{n}The woman who has been keeping her distance now steps closer and whispers to you,{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I'm begging you to listen to me! This man is a member of a noble family! He is being slandered!"
languages.original_text: {n}Стоявшая в стороне девушка делает шаг к вам и шепчет.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, умоляю, послушайте! Этот человек происходит из дворянской семьи! Его пытаются оклеветать!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman who has been keeping her distance steps closer and whispers to you,{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I'm begging you to listen to me! This man is a member of a noble family! He is being slandered!"

{n}The woman who has been keeping her distance steps closer and whispers to you,{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I'm begging you to listen to me! This man is a member of a noble family! He is being slandered!"

{n}The woman who has been keeping her distance now steps closer and whispers to you,{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I'm begging you to listen to me! This man is a member of a noble family! He is being slandered!"

{n}The woman who has been keeping her distance now steps closer and whispers to you,{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I'm begging you to listen to me! This man is a member of a noble family! He is being slandered!"

languages.text: {n}那个原本始终与你保持距离的年轻女子朝你走来，轻声对你开了口。{/n}“来自上界的大人，我恳求您聆听我的辩驳！那个人是贵族家族的成员！他遭到了这些人的诽谤！”
languages.original_text: {n}The woman who has been keeping her distance now steps closer and whispers to you,{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I'm begging you to listen to me! This man is a member of a noble family! He is being slandered!"

traits.locale_text: {n}那个原本始终与你保持距离的年轻女子朝你走来，轻声对你开了口。{/n}“来自上界的大人，我恳求您聆听我的辩驳！那个人是贵族家族的成员！他遭到了这些人的诽谤！”

languages.text: {n}これまで距離を取っていた女性が一歩近づき、ささやいた。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}、どうかお願いです。私の話をお聞きください！この方は由緒ある貴族のご出身なのです！彼は中傷されています！」
languages.original_text: {n}The woman who has been keeping her distance now steps closer and whispers to you,{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I'm begging you to listen to me! This man is a member of a noble family! He is being slandered!"

traits.locale_text: {n}これまで距離を取っていた女性が一歩近づき、ささやいた。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}、どうかお願いです。私の話をお聞きください！この方は由緒ある貴族のご出身なのです！彼は中傷されています！」

languages.text: {n}La muchacha que hasta ahora había guardado las distancias se acerca a ti y te susurra:{/n} «¡Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, le ruego que me escuche! ¡Este hombre pertenece a una familia noble! ¡Todo esto no son más que calumnias!».
languages.original_text: {n}The woman who has been keeping her distance now steps closer and whispers to you,{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I'm begging you to listen to me! This man is a member of a noble family! He is being slandered!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La muchacha que hasta ahora había guardado las distancias se acerca a ti y te susurra:{/n} «¡Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, le ruego que me escuche! ¡Este hombre pertenece a una familia noble! ¡Todo esto no son más que calumnias!».

languages.text: {n}Uzakta duran kadın, sana iyice yaklaşıp kulağına fısıldıyor.{/n} "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, yalvarırım beni dinleyin! Bu adam, soylu bir ailedendir! Ona iftira atılıyor!"
languages.original_text: {n}The woman who has been keeping her distance now steps closer and whispers to you,{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I'm begging you to listen to me! This man is a member of a noble family! He is being slandered!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Uzakta duran kadın, sana iyice yaklaşıp kulağına fısıldıyor.{/n} "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, yalvarırım beni dinleyin! Bu adam, soylu bir ailedendir! Ona iftira atılıyor!"

languages.text: {n}La femme qui se tenait à l'écart s'approche de vous pour vous murmurer :{/n} « Votre Céleste Seigneurie, je vous implore de m'écouter ! Cet homme est membre d'une famille noble ! Tout cela n'est que calomnies ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The woman who has been keeping her distance now steps closer and whispers to you,{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I'm begging you to listen to me! This man is a member of a noble family! He is being slandered!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La femme qui se tenait à l'écart s'approche de vous pour vous murmurer :{/n} « Votre Céleste Seigneurie, je vous implore de m'écouter ! Cet homme est membre d'une famille noble ! Tout cela n'est que calomnies ! »

languages.text: {n}Die Frau, die bislang Abstand gehalten hat, tritt nun heran und flüstert dir zu:{/n} "{mf|Himmlischer Herr|Himmlische Herrin}, ich bitte Euch, hört mir zu! Dieser Mann ist Mitglied einer Adelsfamilie! Er wird hier verleumdet!"
languages.original_text: {n}The woman who has been keeping her distance now steps closer and whispers to you,{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I'm begging you to listen to me! This man is a member of a noble family! He is being slandered!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Frau, die bislang Abstand gehalten hat, tritt nun heran und flüstert dir zu:{/n} "{mf|Himmlischer Herr|Himmlische Herrin}, ich bitte Euch, hört mir zu! Dieser Mann ist Mitglied einer Adelsfamilie! Er wird hier verleumdet!"
